mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT PRO.* FROM TBL_PROGRAM PRO JOIN TBL_PROGRAM_TAGS PRO_TAG ON PRO.idx = PRO_TAG.pro_idx JOIN TBL_TAGS TAG ON PRO_TAG.tag_idx = TAG.idx WHERE 1=1
AND TAG.name IN
#{tag}
order by ${UP} asc
order by ${DOWN} desc
order by CREATE_TM desc
LIMIT ${LIMIT} OFFSET ${OFFSET}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PROGRAM( TITLE , IMAGE , OPERATE , START_TM , END_TM , EXPLAN , CONTENT , CREATE_TM , UPDATE_TM ) VALUES(#{title} , #{image} , #{operate} , #{start_tm} , #{end_tm} , #{explan} , #{content} , now() , now() )
